attachments.title: Rhei - Time flows. Literally.
attachments.text: Rhei is a dynamic installation, an animated sculpture, an idea expressed in the form of a minimalistic, digital clock.

text: interesting that it's permanent magnets moved forward and back instead of electromagnets
there's also this kind of thing if we want to get really crazy: <http://nicadrone.com/index.php?id_product=59&controller=product>

attachments.text: <Shipping again on October 5th> The EPM688-V2.5 is an Electro Permanent Magnet, combining the advantages of electro and permanent magnets. With virtually no power during steady state operation (<1mW) and 800mA for 1.2s during a switch cycle.  Holding force and consistency have been greatly improved (5kg under adverse conditions) and is more resistant to demagnetization during virbration.
attachments.fallback: <Shipping again on October 5th> The EPM688-V2.5 is an Electro Permanent Magnet, combining the advantages of electro and permanent magnets. With virtually no power during steady state operation (<1mW) and 800mA for 1.2s during a switch cycle.  Holding force and consistency have been greatly improved (5kg under adverse conditions) and is more resistant to demagnetization during virbration.

text: you actually realign the magnetic fields in permanent magnets with this thing
the creator of ferrolic is on twitter and seems very responsive if you ever want to chat with him :simple_smile:
